meanings.definition: Move in a twisting or spiraling pattern.
meanings.sent1: The leaves swirl around in the wind.
meanings.sent2: I watched the colors swirl together in the painting.
meanings.sent3: The dancer made the skirt swirl as she twirled around.
meanings.sent4: Thoughts of the upcoming trip swirl in my mind like a whirlpool.
meanings.sent5: The tornado made the debris swirl violently in the air.

meanings.definition: A twisting or spiraling shape or movement.
meanings.sent1: The swirl of the ice cream cone looked delicious.
meanings.sent2: I could see a swirl of dust dancing in the sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The swirl of the river reminded me of a giant snake winding through the forest.
meanings.sent4: The swirl of colors in the sunset painted the sky in a beautiful palette.
meanings.sent5: The swirl of smoke from the chimney created a mesmerizing pattern in the sky.
